titles.title: Recognizing and commending Viola Liuzzo for her extraordinary courage and for her contribution to the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 5/1/1996--Introduced. Commends Viola Liuzzo (a civil rights worker who was murdered because of her efforts on behalf of voting rights) for her extraordinary courage and for her contribution to ensuring that the United States is a nation "with liberty and justice for all."
